game.name: The Old Man’s Will
game.categories: Single-player, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 숲 깊은 곳에 있는 할아버지의 오래된 땅에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 밤이 되면 이상한 생명체들이 돌아다니며, 그들은 굶주리고 예측할 수 없습니다. 카메라를 감시하고, 그들을 먹여 진정시키며, 다섯 밤을 살아남으세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to your grandfather’s old property, a lonely patch of land deep in the woods. Strange creatures roam the area at night, hungry and unpredictable. Watch the cameras, keep them fed, and try to make it through five long nights alive.
